analyzed: sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca eva sa ābhāsam para saṃvide
pratyakṣam anumānam ca sa ābhāsam tu ātma saṃvide
pakṣa hetu dṛṣṭānta vacanaiḥ hi prāśnikānām apratīta ūrthaḥ pratipādyate iti

original: tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddhaviśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭatayā svayaṃ sādhyatvenepsitaḥ |
analyzed: tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddhaḥ dharmī prasiddha viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭa tayā svayam sādhya tvena īpsitaḥ
pratyakṣa dya viruddhaḥ iti vākya śeṣaḥ
pakṣa dharma tvam sapakṣe sattvam vipakṣe ca asattvam iti
anitye śabde sādhye ghaṭa ādiḥ anityaḥ sapakṣaḥ
yat nityam tat akṛtakam dṛṣṭam yathā ākāśam iti

original: tatra kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ vā sapakṣa evāsti vipakṣe nāstyeva |
analyzed: tatra kṛtaka tvam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam vā sapakṣe eva asti vipakṣe na asti eva
yatra hetoḥ sapakṣe eva astitvam khyāpyate
yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādiḥ iti
yatra sādhya abhāve hetoḥ abhāvaḥ eva kathyate
yat nityam tat akṛtakam dṛṣṭam yathā ākāśam iti
nitya śabdena atra anitya tvasya abhāvaḥ ucyate
akṛtaka śabdena api kṛtaka tvasya abhāvaḥ
eṣām vacanāni para pratyāyana kāle sādhanam
kṛtaka tvāt iti pakṣa dharma vacanam

original: yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti sapakṣānugamavacanam |
analyzed: yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādiḥ iti sapakṣa anugama vacanam
yat nityam tat akṛtakam dṛṣṭam yathā ākāśam iti vyatireka vacanam
etāni eva trayaḥ avayavāḥ iti ucyante
sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ api pratyakṣa ādi viruddhaḥ pakṣābhāsaḥ
śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam prāṇi aṅga tvāt śaṅkha śukti vat iti

original: aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇo yathā bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati vināśī śabda iti ||
analyzed: aprasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ yathā bauddhasya sāṃkhyam prati vināśī śabdaḥ iti
vaiśeṣikasya bauddham prati sukha ādi samavāyi kāraṇam ātmā iti

original: eṣāṃ vacanāni dharmasvarūpanirākaraṇamukhena pratipādanāsaṃbhavataḥ sādhanavaiphalyataśceti pratijñādoṣāḥ ||
analyzed: eṣām vacanāni dharma svarūpa nirākaraṇa mukhena pratipādana asaṃbhavataḥ sādhana vaiphalyataḥ ca iti pratijñādoṣāḥ
tatra śabda anitya tve sādhye cākṣuṣā tvāt iti ubhaya asiddhaḥ
kṛtaka tvāt iti śabda abhivyakti vādinam prati anyatara asiddhaḥ
bāṣpa ādi bhāvena saṃdihyamānaḥ bhūta saṃghāta agni siddhau upadiśyamānaḥ saṃdigdha asiddhaḥ
dravam ākāśam guṇa āśraya tvāt iti ākāśa asattva vādinam pratyāśraya asiddhaḥ
sapakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ vipakṣa vyāpī
vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ sapakṣa vyāpī
tatra sādhāraṇaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāt nityaḥ iti
tat hi nitya anitya pakṣayoḥ sādhāraṇa tvāt anaikāntikam
kim ghaṭa vat prameya tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ āhosvit ākāśa vat prameya tvāt nityaḥ iti
asādhāraṇaḥ śrāva kaṇa tvāt nityaḥ iti
tat hi nitya anitya pakṣābhyām vyāvṛtta tvāt nitya anitya vinirmuktasya ca anyasya asaṃbhavāt saṃśaya hetuḥ
sapakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ vipakṣa vyāpī yathā
a prayatna āntarīyakaḥ śabdaḥ nitya tvāt
tatra eka deśe vidyut ādau vidyate nitya tvam na ākāśa ādau
tatra sarvatra ghaṭa ādau vidyate nitya tvam
tasmāt etat api vidyut haṭa sādharmyeṇa na aikāntikam
kim ghaṭa vat anitya tvāt prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ śabdaḥ āhosvit vidyut ādi vat anitya tvāt prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ iti
vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ sapakṣa vyāpī yathā
tatra sarvatra ghaṭa ādau vidyate nitya tvam
tatra eka deśe vidyut ādau vidyate nitya tvam na ākāśa ādau
tasmāt etat api vidyut haṭa sādharmyeṇa pūrva vat anaikāntikam
ubhaya pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ yathā
tatra eka deśe ākāśa ādau vidyate mūrta tvam na paramāṇau
sukha ādau vidyate mūrta tvam na ghaṭa ādau
tasmāt etat api sukha ākāśa sādharmyeṇa anaikāntikam
anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat
nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇa tvāt śabda tva vat iti
ubhayoḥ saṃśaya hetu tvāt dvau api etau eka ūna aikāntikaḥ samuditau eva
dharmi viśeṣa viparīta sādhanaḥ ca iti
tatra dharma svarūpa vipariti sādhanaḥ yathā
nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt ha iti
ayam hetuḥ vipakṣaḥ eva bhāvāt viruddhaḥ
para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ saṃghāta tvāt śayana āsana ādi aṅga viśeṣa vat iti

original: ayaṃ heturyathā pārārthyaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ sādhayati tathā saṃhatatvamapi parasyātmanaḥ sādhayati |
analyzed: ayam hetuḥ yathā pārārthyam cakṣuḥ ādīnām sādhayati tathā saṃhata tvam api parasya ātmanaḥ sādhayati

original: na dravyaṃ na karma na guṇo bhāvaḥ ekadravyavattvāt guṇakarmasu ca bhāvāt sāmanyaviśeṣavaditi |
analyzed: na dravyam na karma na guṇaḥ bhāvaḥ eka dravyavat tvāt guṇa karmasu ca bhāvāt sāmanya viśeṣa vat iti

original: ayaṃ hi heturyathā dravyādipratiṣedhaṃ bhāvasya sādhayati tathā bhāvasyābhāvatvamapi sādhayati |
analyzed: ayam hi hetuḥ yathā dravya ādi pratiṣedham bhāvasya sādhayati tathā bhāvasya abhāva tvam api sādhayati

original: ayameva heturasminneva pūrvapakṣe'syaiva dharmiṇo yo viśeṣaḥ satpratyakartṛtvaṃ nāma tadviparītamasatpratyayakartṛtvamapi sādhayati |
analyzed: ayam eva hetuḥ asmin eva pūrvapakṣe isya eva dharmiṇaḥ yaḥ viśeṣaḥ sat pratyakartṛ tvam nāma tad viparītam asat pratyaya kartṛ tvam api sādhayati
tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvat dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaḥ pañca prakāraḥ
nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrta tvāt paramāṇu vat
yat amūrta tat nityam dṛṣṭam yathā paramāṇauḥ

original: paramāṇu hi sādhyaṃ nityatvamasti sādhanadharmo'mūrtatvaṃ nāsti mūrtatvātparamāṇūnāmiti ||
analyzed: paramāṇu hi sādhyam nitya tvam asti sādhana dharmaḥ mūrta tvam na asti mūrta tvāt paramāṇūnām iti
nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrta tvāt buddhi vat
yat amurtam tat nityam dṛṣṭam yathā buddhiḥ

original: buddhau hi sādhanadharmo'mūrtatvamasti sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ nāsti |
analyzed: buddhau hi sādhana dharmaḥ mūrta tvam asti sādhya dharmaḥ nitya tvam na asti
tatra ghaṭa vat iti vidyamāna ubhaya asiddhaḥ
anitya tvāt mūrta tvāt ca ghaṭasya
ākāśa vat iti avidyamāna ubhaya asiddhaḥ

original: ananvayo yatra vinānvayena sādhyasādhanayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ pradarśyate |
analyzed: ananvayaḥ yatra vinā anvayena sādhya sādhanayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ pradarśyate
yathā ghaṭe kṛtaka tvam anitya tvam ca dṛṣṭam iti

original: yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vaktavye yadanityaṃ tatkṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vravīti ||
analyzed: yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam iti vaktavye yat anityam tat kṛtakam dṛṣṭam iti vravīti
vaidharmyeṇa api dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaḥ pañca prakāraḥ
nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrta tvāt paramāṇu vat
yat anityam tat murtam dṛṣṭam yathā paramāṇuḥ
paramāṇoḥ hi sādhāna dharmaḥ mūrta tvam vyāvṛttam mūrta tvāt paramāṇunām iti
sādhya dharmaḥ nitya tvam na vyāvṛttam nitya tvāt paramāṇūnām iti
sādhana dharmaḥ umūrta tvam na vyāvṛttam
tatas nitya tvam amūrta tvam ca na vyāvṛttam
nitya tvāt amūrta tvāt ca ākāśasya iti

original: avyatireko yatra vinā sādhyasādhananivṛttyā taddhipakṣabhāvo nidarśyate |
analyzed: avyatirekaḥ yatra vinā sādhya sādhana nivṛttyā tad hi pakṣa bhāvaḥ nidarśyate
yathā ghaṭe mūrta tvam anitya tvam ca dṛṣṭam iti

original: yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vaktavye yanmūrtaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti ||
analyzed: yat anityam tat mūrtam dṛṣṭam iti vaktavye yat mūrtam tat anityam dṛṣṭam iti bravīti
eṣām pakṣa hetu dṛṣṭānta ābhāsānām vacanāni sādhana ābhāsam

original: ātmapratyāyanārthaṃ tu pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe ||
analyzed: ātma pratyāyana artham tu pratyakṣam anumānam ca dve eva pramāṇe

original: tatra pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhaṃ yajjñānamarthe rūpādau nāmajātyādikalpanārahitam |
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍham yat jñānam arthe rūpa ādau nāma jāti ādi kalpanā rahitam
tat akṣam akṣam prati vartate iti pratyakṣam

original: tasmādyadanumeye'rthe jñānamutpadyate'gniratra anityaḥ śabda iti vā tadanumānam ||
analyzed: tasmāt yat anumeya ṛthe jñānam utpadyate agniḥ atra anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti vā tat anumānam
ubhayatra tat eva jñānam phalam adhigama rūpa tvāt
sa vyāpāravat khyāteḥ pramāṇa tvam iti
kalpanā jñānam artha antare pratyakṣa ābhāsam

original: yajjñānaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti vā vikalpayataḥ samutpadyate tadarthasvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvātpratyakṣābhāsam ||
analyzed: yat jñānam ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ iti vā vikalpayataḥ samutpadyate tad artha sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tvāt pratyakṣa ābhāsam
tasmāt yat anumeya ṛthe jñānam avyutpannasya bhavati tat anumāna ābhāsam
pakṣa doṣaḥ pratyakṣa ādi viruddha tvam
abhūta sādhana doṣa ubhdāvanāni dūṣaṇa ābhāsāni
a viruddha hetuke viruddha hetukam vacanam
aduṣṭa dṛṣṭānte dṛṣṭa dṛṣṭānta doṣa vacanam
padārtha mātram ākhyātam ādau diś mātra siddhaye
yā atra yukti yuktiḥ vā sā anyatra su vicāritā
